tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
   equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   maintenance_task VARCHAR(255),
   task_frequency VARCHAR(50),
   last_maintenance_date DATE,
   next_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_downtime (
   downtime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_id INT,
   downtime_reason VARCHAR(255),
   start_time TIMESTAMP,
   end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    task_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_downtime (
    downtime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    downtime_start DATETIME,
    downtime_end DATETIME,
    reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_record (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type TEXT,
    technician_id INT,
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    scheduled_date DATE,
    completed_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_downtime (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    downtime_start TIMESTAMP,
    downtime_end TIMESTAMP,
    reason VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_id INT,
    log_date DATE,
    technician VARCHAR(50),
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  scheduled_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  scheduled_by VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(100),
  equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
  installation_date DATE,
  warranty_expiry DATE
);

CREATE TABLE downtime_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  downtime_start DATETIME,
  downtime_end DATETIME,
  downtime_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  maintenance_date DATETIME,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_notes TEXT,
  technician_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE technician (
  technician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  technician_name VARCHAR(100),
  technician_specialty VARCHAR(100),
  hire_date DATE,
  contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);
